job_tasks.phrase: You will be translating complex business processes, into practical software applications.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of converting business requirements into functional software.

job_tasks.phrase: Our applications are built with Python and with Serverless AWS infrastructure CI/CD in a microservices architecture.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the technical foundation and architecture of the software being developed, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: You are most welcome to think with your team about the use of new technologies, product improvements and the software architecture.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in the design and improvement of software systems and architecture, a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: You will work together with allying platforms, peers, and colleagues in the consumer domain.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration within a software development context, working with other systems and teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Moreover, you will be part of the PostNL engineering community in which we share "best practices" and innovations in our company.
job_tasks.justification: This describes participation in a broader engineering community focused on sharing practices and innovations, typical in software development environments.

job_tasks.phrase: As a senior full-stack developer, you will help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI.
job_tasks.justification: While mentioning AI/data science, the primary role described is 'full-stack developer', indicating integration of these capabilities into existing software rather than core AI model development.

job_tasks.phrase: You take the lead in developing innovative solutions, collaborating with experts and promoting technology in the data science community and engineering community.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes leadership in developing solutions and collaboration, which are core software engineering responsibilities, even when applied to AI/data science contexts.

job_tasks.phrase: Senior Integratie Engineer "Door de juiste integratie oplossingen te ontwikkelen zorg jij ervoor dat het applicatie- en IT landschap van PostNL keten breed op elkaar aansluit."
job_tasks.justification: The title 'Senior Integratie Engineer' and the description explicitly point to developing integration solutions to connect different parts of the IT landscape, which is a software development and integration task.

soft_skills.phrase: You will work together with colleagues who dare to seize opportunities and help each other move forward.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights teamwork and mutual support among colleagues.

soft_skills.phrase: You are most welcome to think with your team about the use of new technologies, product improvements and the software architecture.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes collaborative thinking and decision-making within a team.

soft_skills.phrase: you will be part of the PostNL engineering community in which we share "best practices" and innovations in our company.
soft_skills.justification: This describes participation in a community focused on sharing knowledge and best practices.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborating with experts and promoting technology in the data science community and engineering community.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with experts and promoting technology within communities.

soft_skills.phrase: You take the lead in developing innovative solutions
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates taking initiative and leadership in developing new solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be translating complex business processes, into practical software applications.
soft_skills.justification: This task involves understanding business processes and translating them into technical solutions, demonstrating business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: Our platform is mission critical in supplying valuable data to other teams in the Consumer department.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the importance of the platform to the business and its role in supporting other departments.

soft_skills.phrase: You will have ample opportunities to attend training programmes and grow into other positions or departments.
soft_skills.justification: This indicates a focus on employee development and learning opportunities.

soft_skills.phrase: You are most welcome to think with your team about the use of new technologies
soft_skills.justification: This encourages exploration and adoption of new technologies.

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on traditional software development tasks, including translating business processes into applications, working with Python, AWS Serverless, CI/CD, and microservices. While it mentions 'data science and generative AI' and the need to 'make great strides' in these areas, the core responsibilities and the title 'Senior Software Developer' and 'Senior Integratie Engineer' indicate that the role is about building and integrating software systems that *may* incorporate AI/GenAI, rather than developing the AI models themselves. The tasks are predominantly from Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration), with a mention of AI/GenAI as a feature to be integrated or a domain to advance within the existing software platform.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is quite clear about the core software engineering responsibilities and technologies. However, the mention of 'generative AI' is somewhat vague and not elaborated with specific tasks related to GenAI model development or fine-tuning. The primary focus remains on software development and integration, making the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile a strong fit, but the limited detail on the AI aspect prevents a perfect score.
